Name: Yasai Ninja
About the game: Yasai Ninja is a Hack & Slash adventure set in a particular Feudal Japan that tells the story of two veggie-heroes, Kaoru Tamanegi and Broccoli Joe, who will have to learn how to cooperate to fight their way through multiple dangers. Friendship, personal growth, honour and teamwork are combined in this epic tale. Unlock new abilities, levels and achievements, and use each character's special skills to beat puzzles and brawls in order to defeat the corrupt Shogun!
